mapper.sql:
FROM user AS a left join code AS b ON a.genderCd =b.ifcdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND userDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND userName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND userBorn LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND userTel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND userId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND userEmail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND userNickName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT userSeq, userName, genderCd, userBorn, telAgencyCd, userTel, userId, userPw, userEmail, userNickName, userAddress, userDelNy
ORDER BY userSeq DESC LIMIT #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
SELECT userSeq, userName, genderCd, userBorn, telAgencyCd, userTel, userId, userPw, userEmail, userNickName, userAddress, userDelNy FROM user WHERE 1=1 AND userSeq = #{userSeq}
